name: India Travel Group
overview:
India is full of enigmatic experiences to offer. With its magnificent physiographic divisions and authenticity of its culture and people, India is a land of diversity. Travel has been the foundation stone of the cultural cauldron i.e. India.

The three components of tourism are â€“ transport, locale, and accommodation. The locale is shaped by historical, geographical, politico-economic and cultural factors. History provides a glimpse of the richness of Indiaâ€™s cultural heritage. We at IndiaTravelGroup invites you to explore the most diverse and compelling assets of India ranging from rugged mountains and picturesque hills to marvelous beaches and forests, from historical splendors of forts, palaces and shrines to an amazing variety of wild life. We ensure you to the world full of adventure and serenity. It puzzles, excites and fascinates the tourists all over the world. In India there is so much to see and so much to do - the colors and sounds are indeed exotic and enchanting. India is also a shopperâ€™s paradise, be it silks gems and jewellery, handicrafts, textiles, leather goods and carpets. With all this to offer India is becoming a â€˜honey pot destinationâ€™ all over the world. With our organized and customized tours and travel services you will experience yourself motivating towards the beauty of India.

IndiaTravelGroup is a dedicated team of intelligent professionals. We at our end give you the assurance of maximum comfort, durability and full satisfaction by helping you to explore the uniqueness of India. We will guide you through out your tour by providing you the best of our knowledge to augment your stay and giving you maximum personal attention.

Our basic objective is to ensure your journey smoothly and impeccably. Travel with us and you will realize a real world of discovery. We expertise in delivering the best holiday packages in India, keeping in mind your preferences and your comfort.

Whether it be explorers, elite tourists, offbeat tourists, unusual tourists, incipient mass tourists, mass tourists or charter tourists, etc. we provide well-coordinated services and high standard of comfort to all.

Come contact us and we will enchant you with the best experiences you will ever have.
